## Practicals associated with this workshop

Workshop practicals are included as part of the :package: \[malsimtutorial\]. They can be accessed using the `run_tutorial()` function.

-   `malsimtutorial::run_tutorial("Introduction")`
-   `malsimtutorial::run_tutorial("treatment")`
-   `malsimtutorial::run_tutorial("bednets")`
-   `malsimtutorial::run_tutorial("vaccines")`
